_note: INDEPENDENT SELECTORS IMPLEMENTATION: Following CLAUDE.md principles, this configuration uses a single comprehensive selector to capture all cash flow data, then applies intelligent vertical structure parsing with corrected data mapping. The combineIndependentCashFlowFields function detects vertical data arrangement and properly maps: period 0=latest quarter data, period 1=previous quarter, etc. This fixes the 2020-Q3 incorrect values and 2020-Q2 missing data issues by correctly parsing Yahoo Finance's vertical data structure.
